## TileInfoLoader class

Subclass of \[\[TileLoader\]\] which is used by \[\[TileDataSource\]\] to load the \[\[TileInfo\]\] meta data, not the tile data itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TileInfoLoader extends TileLoader 
```
